alert.note: Alert for Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:02PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 345 PM PDT... At 301 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hyatt Lake Campground, or 9 miles east of Ashland, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emigrant Lake, Hyatt Lake Campground and Buck Prairie Nordic Trails. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades
